title: December Looms
text:
December Looms is the second solo album by <a href="John%20Mann%20%28musician%29">John Mann</a> of <a href="Spirit%20of%20the%20West">Spirit of the West</a>, released in 2007. The album is credited to Mister Mann.
The song "By Tomorrow" includes a songwriting credit for Mann's son Harlan.
The album garnered Mann a <a href="Western%20Canadian%20Music%20Award">Western Canadian Music Award</a> nomination for Songwriter of the Year.
